attributes.action: Give parents the choice to keep their children at home, as schools reopen
attributes.additional_details: The anxiety and pressure on students to return when cases are still high and most parents, students and teachers are not fully vaccinated, is unfair and parents should have the choice to protect their families from COVID-19. Many teachers, students and their families will share the concerns about social distancing in schools, when they have firsthand seen the lack of it and know it is not taken seriously. Particularly for students in exam years, as they have no examinations to be preparing for.
attributes.background: Many parents and students are concerned about the data which clearly shows that reopening schools leads to an increase in cases, especially with new variants having an increased effect on younger children.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740
